title.rendered: 25% Off Toys! + Great Pumpkin + John Green + Perry Store

content.rendered:
Only A Few Days Left… 25% OFF ALL TOYS!

Stop by any of our locations and take advantage of our 25% Off Toy Sale. This year we are able to go bigger and better than ever by including ALL TOYS! We now offer Melissa & Doug, Mad Mattr, Smart Max, Crocodile Creek, Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty, SmartMax and more! There is something for everyone here. Hurry in before it’s too late!

 

New Toy Line: Mad Mattr

S-t-r-e-t-c-h your creativity to the max with Mad Mattr®–an addictive, super-soft modeling compound that shapes easily. Make whatever comes to mind! Press it, mold it, knead it, stretch it, squeeze it, or just pull it slowly and watch it flow! And clean up is a breeze since it sticks to itself and not to you. Plus, it never dries out!

 

New Toy Line: SmartMax

SmartMax® sets are colorful and safe magnetic construction toys for young children. These toys stimulate hand-eye coordination, logical thinking, color recognition, and form recognition in 2D & 3D. Stop by and let your little ones create something amazing!

 

Free Halloween Book

Kids who come in to our Macon and Warner Robins stores wearing their Halloween costume on Saturday, October 28th will receive a FREE copy of  It’s the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown. Promotion is good for ages 0-8. One free book per family. While supplies last!

 

New John Green Book: Turtles All The Way Down

#1 bestselling author John Green returns with his first new novel since The Fault in Our Stars. We are so excited to offer signed copies to our customers!

“[Green] shows us true love – two teenagers helping and accepting each other through the most humiliating physical and emotional ordeals – and it is far more romantic than any sunset on the beach” –The New York Times Book Review

“John Green deftly mixes the profound and the quotidian in this tough, touching valentine to the human spirit.” –The Washington Post

 

Perry Store

Our Perry store is looking amazing after its month-long renovation. With brand new floors, an open floor plan, and more inventory than ever before, we can’t wait to see the look on our customer’s faces when they see it for the first time. Stop by and check out the completely redone interior!
